animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love to eat peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: I'm often seen in a circus.
I'm the largest land animal.
I can use my nose to spray water.

animal.question: I say 'meow' and love to chase mice. I purr when I'm happy. Who am I?

hints.text: I love to play with yarn.
I drink milk.
I have whiskers.

animal.question: I have a long neck and spots all over my body. I eat leaves from tall trees. Who am I?

hints.text: I live in Africa.
I eat leaves most animals can't reach.
I'm the tallest mammal.

animal.question: I live in the ocean and have eight arms. I can change color to hide. Who am I?

hints.text: I live in the sea.
I can squirt ink.
I don't have bones.

animal.question: I roar loudly and am known as the king of the jungle. I have a big mane. Who am I?

hints.text: I am a very powerful animal.
I am a carnivore.
I live in Africa and Asia.

animal.question: I hop around and love to eat carrots. I have long ears. Who am I?

hints.text: I like to eat vegetables.
I can be a pet.
I am a herbivore.

animal.question: I waddle and lay eggs. I live in cold places. Who am I?

hints.text: I like to live in Antarctica.
I eat fish.
I cannot fly.

animal.question: I am a reptile with a hard shell. I move very slowly. Who am I?

hints.text: I can live a very long time.
I eat plants and sometimes insects.
I can retract my head into my shell for safety.

animal.question: I fly at night and use echolocation to find my way. People think I'm a bit spooky. Who am I?

hints.text: I sleep upside down.
I am nocturnal.
I can eat fruits, insects, or even blood depending on the species.

animal.question: I'm a master of disguise, blending seamlessly into my surroundings. I have independently moving eyes. Who am I?

hints.text: I like to eat insects.
I can change color to match my environment.
I live in warm climates and climb trees.
